org.anchoranalysis.io.bioformats.bean

Class BioformatsReader

  • Object
    • AnchorBean<StackReader>
      • StackReader
        • BioformatsReader

  • public class BioformatsReader
extends StackReader
    Reads a stack using the Bioformats library.

    Note that EXIF orientation information is not processed when reading JPEGs or PNGs.

    Author:
    Owen Feehan
